name: Sabrina Trinidad Panlilio
text: okies, next time after taking a gym go to Shop and click the shield thingie in the upper-right corner for 10 coins. If you take a second gym while still holding the first you can claim another 10, but if you lost the first you can't get anything. Reset time till you can stick in a gym and claim again is 21 hours. I've only made 220 coins so far
